html: 5.15.17  10:21 pm   My friend really enjoyed your Japan and history of the world hotewig video. There was only one problem. He asked "who is this guy?" I told him "bill wurtz" but I didn't exactly know how to define who you are and what you do. How can I define who you are and what you do?

5.15.17  9:40 pm   In your video movies you say you watch movies all day until you puke, does this mean you lied to us about working all day in your free time, or vice versa?

     You hurt me. My heart aches. How could you lie to us.
